peril.helpers

Class UnitHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.helpers.UnitHelper

  • public final class UnitHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores the ModelUnits that are currently in use. Singleton
    Since:
    2018-02-18
    Version:
    1.01.01
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    ModelUnit, LinkedList

      Retrieves the strongest ModelUnit contained in this UnitHelper.
      ModelUnit getUnitAbove(ModelUnit unit)
      Retrieves the ModelUnit above the specified ModelUnit in terms of strength that is contained in this UnitHelper.
      ModelUnit getUnitBelow(ModelUnit unit)
      Retrieves the ModelUnit below the specified ModelUnit in terms of strength that is contained in this UnitHelper.

      Retrieves the weakest ModelUnit contained in this UnitHelper.
